Continuous Connectivity for Your Lifestyle
You work hard, and you don’t have time to deal with slow or inconsistent in-flight Wi-Fi service! You deserve continuous connectivity and the flexibility to spend your flight as productive or entertained as you desire.
With JetWave’s powerful satellite communications hardware seamless connectivity is possible. JetWave exclusively powers Inmarsat’s Jet ConneX service, providing worldwide coverage at speeds up to 15 Mbps. Plus, when you manage your connection speeds with Honeywell’s premier services platform, GoDirect™, you can confidently stream from your seat knowing you have the speeds you need to connect!
With recent changes to U.S. tax rules that allow you to write off up to 100%of equipment purchases for business aircraft, including JetWave, there’s never been a better time to upgrade your in-flight Wi-Fi capabilities.
So, what are you waiting for? Stop fighting your unreliable Wi-Fi connection and contact StandardAero today to schedule your JetWave installation.
